abstract: Understanding the opportunities, challenges and future steps in deep learning.

abstract: Identify the potential of AI to overcome global disparities in access, diagnosis, and treatment in cancer care.
authors: Thomas Fuchs|Gabriele Campanella|Dig Vijay Kumar Yarlagadda|Christina Virgo|Hassan Muhammad|Johan Lundin|Peter Kingham|Olusegun Isaac Alatise
title: AI for Overcoming Global Disparities in Cancer Care
